name: Strapi
natural_language_description: 这是 Strapi 节点。主要用于: Consume Strapi API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: password

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: entry

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many entries

contentType.name: contentType
contentType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content Type | 作用: Name of the content type | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows

entryId.name: entryId
entryId.description: The ID of the entry to get
entryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entry ID | 作用: The ID of the entry to get | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: publicationState (值: None) - Only select entries matching the publication state provided

sort (值: None) - Name of the fields to sort the data by. By default will be sorted ascendingly. To modify that behavior, you have to add the sort direction after the name of sort field preceded by a colon. For example: `name:asc`.
where (值: None) - JSON query to filter the data. More info.

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".
updateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Key | 作用: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id". | 默认值: id | (必填项)
